text: Saya sangat suka dengan favehotel Bitung karena suasananya yang tenang dan nyaman, favehotel Bitung mempunyai interior ruangan yang unik dan bersih, makanannya enak dan chefnya ramah, staff friendly dan sigap membantu
title: Pengalaman menyenangkan yang tak terlupakan

text: Thanks to mbak Eka, Shurly, Indah, Kezia for nice hospitality.. #favorite #bitung #hotel #accomodation #recommended # favehotel #stayatfave #archipelago #stayatarchipelago #faveinside #favehotelbitung
title: Recommended place to go

text:
As North Sulawesi work towards recovery in the tourism sector, it was good to be able to stay at a familiar hotel chain in a new town. We rode the northern coastline from Manado to Likupang on our rented scooters, only to find that most resorts by the beach were still closed. Made our way southwards to Bitung and checked-in at the favehotel, a local hotel chain. 
Attentive staff, very very clean rooms and a decent local breakfast. Value for money. Plenty of places to east within walking distance, and a convenience store next door.
title: A friendly familiar hotel

text: Including this month, its my 2nd visit to this hotel. Staying here has always been relaxing thus made me perform job well. Great food, very clean room, friendly and helpful staff is all i need. Perfect
title: Perfect for work and rest

text:
Convenient place. 
The assignment this time was very pleasant because there was no need to be confused anymore to find a hotel that was comfortable and guaranteed cleanliness.  especially now that we are still in a pandemic.  since checking in without direct interaction, the hotel is comfortable and clean of course.
title: Convenient place

text:
Our group stay here for bussiness reason. We check in by google link. So it's more easy and time convenience for us. Due to pandemic, they provide health protocol with temperature scanner and hand sanitizer before you enter the hotel.
The room suprisingly big enough, and their view is quite amazing. We can see Lembeh Strait from our room. Their staff are professional and very helpfull and their "sup buntut" really tasty.
title: Their view is amazing

text: Clean, good services & hospitality. The restaurant menu  & other facilities are ok. Location is at the central of the city, near to main government offices and public areas. Stay in Fave Hotel during the visit to beautiful Bitung is recommended. 👍👍
title: Fave Hotel Bitung

text: Quite a good hotel boutique with swimming pool. Located in bitung city near the Bitung port. Surrounded with local restaurant near by so easy to find by walk. Hotel restaurant applied health protocol due to pandemic. And their service are excellent.
title: Workshop

text:
Nice place for rest in Bitung city.. good service and clear hotel, easy to find plase cause in the central of city

Its have swimming pool for childreen...

Overall its highly recomender for stay here.....

Regards
title: Rest in Favehotel bitung
